Changelog
=========

0.4 - (2009/04/19)
------------------

* main_template removed to regain viewlet flexibility
* css files merged into main.css
* fix issue #3: style of "title" and "description" is wrong
* fix issue #7: Display/CSS bugs in IE

0.3 - (2009/02/04)
------------------

* css fixes
* main_template clean up

0.2 - (2008/12/23)
------------------

* Initial release
